description.value: StatusCode in correspondance messages must be filled in with a valid status as specified. It indicates if the correspondance message is completely new (the most common case), or if it replaces a previously sent correspondance message. Derived from http://svn.medcom.dk/svn/releases/Standarder/Den%20gode%20korrespondance/XML/Dokumentation/XDIS91.pdf, see 'StatusCode'

display.value: A new correspondance message, which does not replace a previous one

value.value: En ny korrespondancemeddelelse, som ikke erstatter et tidligere

display.value: A correspondance message, which replaces a previous one

value.value: En korrespondancemeddelelse, som erstatter et tidligere sendt
